column4: Hi.  I just tried to grow a 20gig partition to 30gig.  Gparted resized the partition but has also increased the used space by 10gig.  Any ideas?
pass a fsck to the partition and you will get the space back
if it is the root partition just « sudo touch /forcefsck » and reboot
if it is not the easiest way is to use a livecd (gparted can be used)
